binding:binding.name: Plugwise Binding
binding:binding.description: Monitor and control Plugwise ZigBee devices using the Stick. Supported devices are the Circle, Circle+, Scan, Sense, Stealth and Switch.

parameter.name: stick.port
parameter.label: Stick serial port
parameter.description: The serial port of the Stick, e.g. "COM1" for Windows or "/dev/ttyUSB0" for Linux.

parameter.name: stick.interval
parameter.label: Message wait time
parameter.description: Interval in milliseconds to wait between messages sent on the ZigBee network.
